comments:
BIRT 1.0M1, Eclipse 3.1M5a, EMF 2.0.1, GEF 3.1M5, VE 1.0.2, Windows XP SP2.

While trying to run the tutorial, after reporting bug 87827 I closed the report
designer and tried to reopen it by double-clicking on Customers.rptdesign, and I
got a dialog that said:

Error: An error has occurred. See error log for more details.

One time the editor sort of came up but it had no title, and another time it
just didn't show up at all. I can't go any further until I find a workaround.

The error log contained this traceback:

After Release 1, We will generate the 3.1 compatible code.
*** Bug 87827 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The standard configuration is eclipse 3.1 + gef 3.0.x + emf 2.1.
The code also compatible with eclipse 3.0.x + gef 3.0.x + emf 2.0.x

The standard configuration is eclipse 3.1 + gef 3.0.x + emf 2.1.
The code also compatible with eclipse 3.0.x + gef 3.0.x + emf 2.0.x.
The GEF 3.1 is not code compatible with 3.0.x. That will be supported later.
